description: Try our easy to follow Mapo Tofu recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Tofu stir-fry,Winter,Low sugar,Beef,Jul 2020,Fakeaway,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,Rice,Mince,Quick & easy lunch,Tofu
name: Mapo Tofu Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 bunch spring onions, white and green parts separated (thinly sliced)

recipeInstructions.text: Place 2 1/2 cups water in a large saucepan and bring to the boil over high heat. Add rice, reduce heat to low, then cover and cook for 10 minutes or until rice is just tender. Remove pan from heat.
Meanwhile, heat oil in a wok over high heat. Add mince and cook, breaking up with a spoon, for 5 minutes or until browned.

Add garlic, white part of onion, XO sauce and half the chilli, then stir-fry for 1 minute or until fragrant. Whisk stock, wine, soy sauce, sugar and cornflour together in a bowl. Add to wok and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 7 minutes or until sauce thickens slightly.
Add tofu and beans, then stir-fry for 2 minutes or until warmed through. Divide rice among bowls, and top with mapo tofu, and remaining chilli and green part of onion. Serve.
